comments:
I did an edit and Ctrl-S (quickly, one after the other) on a 2500+ lines
build.xml and Eclipse appear to lock up with 70% CPU usage and then dumped the
following on the console. Version 3.0.m7.

java.lang.ClassCastException

This exception is triggered from doing a code completion for properties on a 
top level task or type. The CPU being busy is likely from the code assist 
triggered a reconcile (see bug 52202).

Fixed in AntEditorCompletionProcessor.

Test case:
<project default="environ">
    <import file="${"/>
</project>

Code assist after the "${"

Please verify Jared.
